name: SetEndEffectorPose
description: This message defines the desired end-effector position and orientation.  The coordinates of the tool point are defined in terms of the vehicle coordinate system.  The orientation of the end-effector is defined by a unit quaternion (d ; a, b, c) which specifies the axis and angle of rotation that was used to establish the orientation of the end-effector coordinate system with respect to the vehicle coordinate system.

MessageID.comment: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

DComponentOfUnitQuaternionQ.comment: quaternion q = d + ai +bj + ck defines the orientation of the manipulator coordinate system measured with respect to the vehicle coordinate system

AComponentOfUnitQuaternionQ.comment: quaternion q = d + ai +bj + ck defines the orientation of the manipulator coordinate system measured with respect to the vehicle coordinate system

BComponentOfUnitQuaternionQ.comment: quaternion q = d + ai +bj + ck defines the orientation of the manipulator coordinate system measured with respect to the vehicle coordinate system

CComponentOfUnitQuaternionQ.comment: quaternion q = d + ai +bj + ck defines the orientation of the manipulator coordinate system measured with respect to the vehicle coordinate system
